  • Field Details

    • HEX_DIGITS

      public static final char[] HEX_DIGITS
      Hex digits. 0123456789abcdef

    • HEX_S2B

      public static final int[] HEX_S2B
      Hex string to byte lookup. -1 if non-hex, else hex nibble value.

    • HEX_B2S

      public static final char[][] HEX_B2S
      Hex byte to string lookup. returns 2-char hex encoding

      Returns:
      lower case hex encoded string

    • b2s

      public static String b2s(byte[] buf, int start, int len)
      Returns hex string representation of byte[].
      Parameters:
      buf - byte array
      start - pos in buf to start at
      len - number of bytes to encode
      Returns:
      hex encoded string

    • i2s

      public static String i2s(int num)
      Return 8 char (lower case) hex encoded 32-bit big-endian value
      Parameters:
      num - number to encode
      Returns:
      8 char (lower case) hex encoded 32-bit big-endian value

    • s2b

      public static byte[] s2b(String hex)
      Returns byte[] from hex string. Ignores any non-hex chars. Pads extra 0 on end if odd number of hex chars.
      Parameters:
      hex - hex string e.g. "01ff"
      Returns:
      byte array. e.g. byte[] {1, 255}

    • dump

      public static String dump(byte[] buf)
      Print hex dump of buf
      Parameters:
      buf - buf
      Returns:
      hex dump

    • dump

      public static void dump(StringBuilder sb, byte[] buf, int start, int len, String indent, int lineLen, boolean lineNum)
      Hex dump.
      Parameters:
      sb - stringbuilder for result
      buf - buf to dump
      start - start index
      len - length
      indent - string for indent
      lineLen - number of bytes per line (16 or 32 are good choices)
      lineNum - if true, line numbers are shown in left col
